kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Browser and related concepts.
kw.msg: {"browser": "chromium", "headless": false, "handleSIGINT": true, "handleSIGTERM": true, "handleSIGHUP": true, "timeout": 30000.0, "devtools": false, "slowMo": 0.0}
Successfully created browser with options: {"browser":"chromium","headless":false,"handleSIGINT":true,"handleSIGTERM":true,"handleSIGHUP":true,"timeout":30000,"devtools":false,"slowMo":0}

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page. A Page is the Playwright equivalent to a tab. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Page concept. Returns a stable identifier for the created page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: about:blank

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates to the given ``url``.
kw.msg: Succesfully opened URL https://theotokus-bodytest-web.herokuapp.com/

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``text`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'admin@bodytest.com' in the given field.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``text`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'pwd123' in the given field.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``. See the `Finding elements` section for details about the selectors.

test.name: Cenario: Buscar títulos por um único termo

kw.name: Get JSON
Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.
kw.msg: Getting file '/home/edson/workspace/courses/qa_ninja/robot_framework/bodytest/resources/fixtures/plans-search.json'.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.
kw.msg: ${json_object} = {'word': 'Plano', 'total': 3, 'plans': [{'title': 'Plano Alpha', 'duration': 12, 'price': 50}, {'title': 'Plano Beta', 'duration': 12, 'price': 50}, {'title': 'Plano Omega', 'duration': 12, 'price': 5...

${fixtures} = {'word': 'Plano', 'total': 3, 'plans': [{'title': 'Plano Alpha', 'duration': 12, 'price': 50}, {'title': 'Plano Beta', 'duration': 12, 'price': 50}, {'title': 'Plano Omega', 'duration': 12, 'price': 5...

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
kw.msg: ${plans} = [{'title': 'Plano Alpha', 'duration': 12, 'price': 50}, {'title': 'Plano Beta', 'duration': 12, 'price': 50}, {'title': 'Plano Omega', 'duration': 12, 'price': 50}]

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
kw.msg: ${word} = Plano

kw.name: Set Variable

kw.msg: delete from plans where title = 'Plano Alpha'
